title.narrative: Youth Empowerment For Urban Development

description.narrative: The overall goal of this project is to improve the livelihoods of young men and women, especially those living in slums and unplanned settlements, through their inclusion in governance and the social and economic life of cities, and The overall goal of this project is to improve the livelihoods of young men and women, especially those living in slums and unplanned settlements, through their inclusion in governance and the social and economic life of cities, through giving them access to financial resources, and publish research-based policy recommendations to decision makers at local, national and international level.

mailing-address.narrative: UN-HABITAT P.O. Box 30030 GPO Nairobi 00100 Kenya

target.value: 14 members elected and YAB established as a formal board with elected representative from each region. Youth Advisory Board substantially involved in planning of WUYA 2012, youth events at GC 24, and Rio +20

target.value:
Outreach consolidated and expanded Publishing of quarterly e-newsletters 7. 10 ease studies on best practices from Youth Fund recipients 8. MOT/Youth Envoys strategy developed 9. MOT/Youth Envoys utilized to reach larger audience 4.4.b Increase of Facebook friends from 10,000 to 15,000 and Twitter account to 15,000 friends
4.4.c. Publishing and dissemination research with partners on GYHD i) quarterly Children, Youth and Environment Centre Journal
4.4.d. Publishing of reports or practitioners guides on new focus areas: i.e. planning, governance.
